Articles.Content:
I'm wondering is it possible to build interstages with the new fairings. I've tried but it insists that I build a whole fairing and won't let me leave the top open so I've not been able to so far.

 Has anyone had success with this?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T18:03:17Z" title="04/29/2015 06:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Frozen\_Heart**
Just click on the part you want it to attach to. I think.

> 
> Just click on the part you want it to attach to. I think.

That worked. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) didn't know you could so that. I was just being derpy.
